about_the_game:
Whether you're a beginner trying out simple songs or just an experienced fan of the music, here are the music sheets for the songs in the game. Images will be added as soon as possible.

They come as .png, .jpg and .mscz files. (If you still have the old .mxl files, feel free to ignore or delete them)

You can locate them in the DLC folder in the main game's directory, which can be found by right clicking the game in the library and pressing "Browse local files" within the "manage" section.
detailed_description:
Made Possible By snekmuffin

Huge thanks to snekmuffin for providing these sheets!


About the Game

Whether you're a beginner trying out simple songs or just an experienced fan of the music, here are the music sheets for the songs in the game. Images will be added as soon as possible.

You can locate them in the DLC folder in the main game's directory, which can be found by right clicking the game in the library and pressing "Browse local files" within the "manage" section.
